CHAT.comment: Home Visit 1; took place in living room; Mot seated on couch , Chi standing/sitting next to her; evening of a warm summer day

u.a: has been bouncing around on couch
comes and stands next to Mot
starts inspecting dollar bill given to him by his father
aft takes dollar bill away and turns page
CHI has named three items starting from the right side of the right hand page and progressing to the left
sausage is surrounded by pie on the left and cupcake on the right
his baby brother has just come in
turns her attention back to book
cupcake is just to the left of watermelon
<4> pause separates 'butter' and 'fly' and stress is on 'fly' as though 'butter' were an adjective
inside back of book is very colorful
turns around and climbs up couch
